title: Bitcoin: How Safe is it? Responsibility, Value and Trust through Decentralized Digital Scarcity
description:
(Scroll down for links). Buck, a developer with Unchained Capital, joins me for a conversation about bitcoin. What is it? How does it work? Will it scale? Is it fraud proof?How does it maintain scarcity? 

What is a node? What is a block? What is a miner? 

How does bitcoin incentivize a responsible approach to life?
What really happened in the 2008 housing crisis?

Jordan Peterson video on Bitcoin: https://youtu.be/iVym9wtopqs

What the Fees? by Buck Perley:  https://unchained-capital.com/blog/what-the-fees-understanding-the-costs-of-bitcoin-transactions/

Inheritance Planning by Parker Lewis:  https://unchained-capital.com/blog/inheritance-planning-on-a-bitcoin-standard/

The website of Unchained Capital 
https://unchained-capital.com
